channel.title: Geography help needed
channel.description:
anyone able to help me answer these questions:
Identify three rivers for which the Mississippi River is base level.
and
Identify the bay, sound or gulf that serves as base level for: The Sacramento and San Joaquin rivers The Alabama River System The Connecticut River System

item.title: Geography help needed
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

i know this is quite long winded, but i found it useful when doing the Mississippi: http://biology.usgs.gov/s+t/SNT/noframe/ms137.htm
